articles.title: Greetings to Indian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Indian President
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Indian President Pratibha Devisingh Patil on the Day of the Republic of India. 
					Expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in different fields by the common efforts, Kim Yong Nam sincerely wished the Indian president happiness in good health and bigger success in his work for prosperity and development of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Indian PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Indian PM
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim sent a message of greetings to Indian Prime Minister Manmohan Singh Tuesday on the Day of the Republic of India. 
					Choe sincerely wished the Indian prime minister happiness in good health and bigger success in the work for development and prosperity of India.
					
					DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun also sent a similar message to Indian Foreign Minister S. M. Krishna on the same day.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Construction Sites
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Construction Sites
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim on Tuesday made field survey of the Pyongyang Folk Park and the greenhouse of the Pyongyang Vegetable Science Institute now under construction.
					A dynamic drive is being waged to accelerate the projects true to the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un aimed to provide richer and more cultural living conditions to the Korean people.
					
					Choe acquainted himself in detail with the construction situation touring various places where innovations are being created on a daily basis under the flame of Hamnam to thoroughly implement the decision of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the joint calls of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK and tasks set forth in the joint editorial for this year.
					
					He convened a consultative meeting of officials concerned there.
					
					At the meeting he stressed the need to accelerate the construction of the Pyongyang Folk Park and the expansion construction of the greenhouse of Pyongyang Vegetable Science Institute true to the behests of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					Discussed there were issues to push forward the projects without stop even under the wintry conditions by positively introducing the reasonable and scientific construction methods and preferentially providing materials needed for construction for the earlier completion of the projects.
					
					At the meeting practical measures were taken for commanding officials to provide production and command in an organized manner in the stirring construction site as befitting officials required by the era of a great surge and for relevant sectors and fields to satisfactorily supply materials according to process-specific plans to keep pace with the projects progressing apace in the final stage.

articles.title: Unhasu Orchestra Gives New Year's Concert in Huichon
articles.content:
Unhasu Orchestra Gives New Year's Concert in Huichon
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- The Unhasu Orchestra gave the concert "The Cause of the Sun Will Be Immortal" on Wednesday in Huichon, Jagang Province.
					It was enjoyed by officials of the party and power bodies and working people's organizations of Jangang Province, and officials and workers of the industrial establishments in the province including the Huichon Ryonha General Machinery Plant and the Huichon Precision Machine Plant. 
					
					Colorful numbers included female trio and chorus "Cantata to Comrade Kim Jong Il", female trio and pangchang immortal masterpiece "Song of Best Wishes" and chorus "His Life".
					
					The performers sang high praises of the great feats of leader Kim Jong Il with deep yearning for him who made the devoted life-long service for the country and the people. 
					
					The audience renewed their pledge to devote themselves to the building of a thriving nation as befitting creators of Kanggye spirit, standard-bearers of the industrial revolution in the new century and vanguard in the drive for pushing back the frontiers of the latest science and technology whom Kim Jong Il put forward with deep trust. 
					
					The orchestra gave the concerts before full houses in Hamhung from Jan. 17 to 23.

articles.title: 20-Day Industrial Output Value Shows 1.2 Times Increase in DPRK
articles.content:
20-Day Industrial Output Value Shows 1.2 Times Increase in DPRK
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- The gross industrial output value grew 1.2 times for twenty days of January this year as against the same period last year.
					This is the result of the high-pitched drive waged by all the workers of the country since the first day of this year after receiving with excitement the joint calls of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, the joint New Year editorial for this year and the letter of the working people in South Hamgyong Province.
					
					In the period, the Ministry of Light Industry increased the production 1.4 times and the Ministry of Food and Daily Necessities sharply boosted the production.
					
					Thermal and hydropower stations have increased the ratio of operating the generating equipment.
					
					Much effort is being concentrated on supplying coal to the thermal power plants and chemical and metal plants and developing more coal beds.
					
					The Ministry of Coal Industry produced 12 000 more tons of coal than planned for the 20 days.
					
					Iron mills and steelworks also increased the production.
					
					The freight transport volume increased by 12 percent from the same period last year.
					
					Innovations were made in the production of vinalon and fertilizer by the industrial establishments in the field of chemical industry and in the production of custom built equipment and mining machines by the industrial enterprises of the field of machine industry.
					
					The forestry stations and pit wood stations increased the timber production.
					
					Progress has been reported on a daily basis from the important projects including the building of apartments in Mansudae areas and the Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station.

articles.title: DPRK Produces Massive Saplings of Dwarf Apple Trees
articles.content:
DPRK Produces Massive Saplings of Dwarf Apple Trees
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- The Bioengineering Branch under the State Academy of Sciences of the DPRK is mass-producing saplings of dwarf apple trees.
					The plant tissue culture research group has produced 1.2 times as many cultured saplings as that of the daily plan.
					
					Scientists have already introduced the ultra-tissue culture techniques and completed the research into induction and culture of sterile sprouts, sprouting in test tube and induction of roots and effective acclimatization of tissue cultured saplings and various other methods. They also established new technique of massively multiplying high-yielding strain, thus making a breakthrough in the intensive industrialization of the sapling production.
					
					Officials and scientists of the branch actively expanded the research to make another breakthrough in the tissue culture, thus providing a firm scientific guarantee for increasing the production by several times than before.
					
					The plant tissue culture department introduced new technical innovative plans and doubled the multiplying rate of the cultured sapling.
					
					The science and research greenhouse, too, is acclimatizing those saplings grown in test tube in the effective way.
					
					The production of saplings is rapidly increasing thanks to the devoted research of scientists and technicians of the academy to make a contribution to the improvement of the people's standard of living true to the vow made before the bier of leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Exploits of Kim Jong Il for External Activities Lauded by Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Exploits of Kim Jong Il for External Activities Lauded by Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a bylined article that leader Kim Jong Il made undying contributions to carrying out the global independence.
					The article goes on:
					
					With clear insight into the complicated trend of the world politics and the prevailing situation he made outstanding successes of important significance in intensifying the international solidarity with the Korean revolution and raising the DPRK's international prestige with his seasoned and active external activities. He defended world peace and security and performed great exploits for the accomplishment of the global cause of independence.
					
					He demonstrated the might of Songun Korea by developing the DPRK-China and the DPRK-Russia friendship.
					
					His historic visits to China and Russia demonstrated the solidity and might of the DPRK's friendship with both countries, encouraged world forces for independence against imperialism and dealt a heavy political blow at the world anti-revolutionary forces.
					
					He obstructed and smashed the imperialist allied forces' moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK with his extraordinary diplomatic strategy, thereby making a great contribution to safeguarding the Korean revolution.
					
					He pursued superb diplomatic strategy by far surpassing the enemies.
					
					He countered the enemies' highhanded practices with diplomatic strategy to drive the hostile forces to a serious crisis and made great contributions to defending the peace and security of East Asia and the rest of the world and advancing the independent cause, the socialist cause of popular masses.
					
					He was a great diplomatic strategist as he won a big victory by defeating the formidable imperialist enemy who styled itself as the world's "only superpower" and demonstrated the dignity and honor of socialist Songun Korea.
					
					He also made a great contribution to the work for ending the DPRK-Japan hostile relations, leftover of the 20th century.
					
					At Pyongyang meeting and talks with the Japanese prime minister he clarified the DPRK's principled stand and fundamental ways for the normalization of the bilateral relations and gave clear answers to outstanding issues raised by Japan, thereby providing the historic DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration.
					
					He flung open the door to the development of foreign relations with independent diplomacy.
					
					He met the EU high-ranking delegation which visited the DPRK in May 2001. At the talks with the delegation he gave straightforward answers to the complicated international issues of its concern with iron logic and outstanding insight. With this visit as an occasion the EU established diplomatic ties with the DPRK and this led to opening a new phase in the bilateral relations.
					
					He embodied the idea of believing in people as in Heaven, his life-long cherished opinion and maxim, in the field of external activities and embraced the people with endless trust, solicitude and noble humanity.
					
					The glorious history of his external activities has served as a genuine textbook illumining the path of victory and a source of invincibility of all the countries aspiring after the independent diplomacy for its rich and deep content and great influence.

articles.title: Anniversary of North Side Headquarters of Pomminryon Marked: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Anniversary of North Side Headquarters of Pomminryon Marked: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday dedicates a bylined article to the 21st anniversary of the North Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon).
					The inauguration of the headquarters in the wake of Pomminryon, parent body of the nationwide movement for reunification, marked an epochal turn in strengthening the driving force of national reunification and promoting the development of the nation's movement for reunification, the article says, and goes on:
					
					The headquarters has fulfilled its responsibilities for staging nationwide movement for reunification for over two decades since its formation.
					
					Formation of Pomminryon and its remarkable successes are a shining fruition of the idea of President Kim Il Sung, eternal sun of the nation, and leader Kim Jong Il on the great national unity and their wise leadership.
					
					This year marks the 40th anniversary of the three principles of national reunification and 5th anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					
					The three charters for national reunification and the inter-Korean declarations are a precious legacy Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il left to the Korean nation while making life dedication to the national reunification. They also constitute a solid foundation for independent reunification. It provides a sure guarantee for the victory of the independent reunification to preserve and creditably carry forward the peerlessly great men's patriotic legacy for reunification.
					
					Implementation of the inter-Korean declarations also guarantees a rosy future of national reunification and represents genuine patriotism.
					
					National independence serves as a basic principle for national reunification.
					
					It is the requirement of the June 15 era of reunification to reject outside aggressors and pool efforts of Koreans.
					
					Pomminryon should actively support the south Koreans' struggle for independence against the U.S. and Lee Myung Bak, thus making a tangible contrition to putting an earlier end to the history of national division and disgrace.
					
					The great national unity is the mainstay for national reunification and main goal of Pomminryon's patriotic movement for reunification.
					
					Koreans are responsible for the movement for national reunification and the solidarity and alliance of Koreans in the north, south and overseas is a treasured sword for the victory of the movement.

articles.title: Crackdown on Peace Activists Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Crackdown on Peace Activists Protested in S. Korea
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- Organizations of south Korea denounced the puppet authorities for their crackdown upon peace movement in a press conference in Seoul on Jan. 18. They included the Asian Joint Action against Imperialism, the Confederation of Trade Unions and the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification.
					At the conference speakers recalled that the security authorities unreasonably barred a Japanese peace activist from participating in an international seminar on peace held on Jeju Island last year.
					
					They accused the authorities of detaining him for three days before forcibly sending him back to Japan.
					
					They termed it illegal and a human rights abuse.
					
					At the end of the conference its participants submitted a written statement signed by social activists in south Korea and Japan to the Human Rights Committee in protest against the authorities' suppression.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Confrontation with DPRK Accused
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Confrontation with DPRK Accused
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group of traitors are getting evermore undisguised in their intention to escalate confrontation with the DPRK from the outset of this year.
					Traitor Lee Myung Bak in a "special new year policy speech" said that "big change is predicted in the situation on the Korean Peninsula and Northeast Asia." He made such an impudent remark that "the situation on the peninsula has entered fresh turning-point and window of opportunity is opened."
					
					The black-hearted design of the Lee group of traitors, obsessed with daydream of confrontation between systems, has been further brought to light during the period when the nation mourned over the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					As soon as an important announcement on his demise was made public the group busied itself convening emergency meetings of the "National Security Council" and "State Council", as if "contingency" had arrived and thinking that a "chance" presented itself to bring about a "system change" in the DPRK.
					
					The military authorities formed emergency teams under the "Ministry of National Defense" and the Joint Chiefs of Staff and put the puppet army on a heightened emergency alert and ordered it to adopt a war posture.
					
					Chongwadae, administrations and offices also went into an emergency standby.
					
					The group set up a committee grouping more than 40 members of "government" bodies including the Intelligence Service and the "Institute for Security and Strategy" with the minister of "Unification" as its chief, while raising a hue and cry over "possibility of chaos in the north" and "contingency." It even drafted an "emergency plan" allegedly to cope with any eventuality.
					
					The group of traitors, which is bereft of elementary ethics, worked hard with bloodshot eyes to hurt the fellow countrymen stricken with grief over the great loss to the nation. Its war hysteria is an unpardonable hideous crime.
					
					The puppet group seeks to maintain its power while trumpeting about "change" but it was south Korea which experienced regime change as a result of several contingencies such as April 19 Popular Uprising.
					
					The people's mind-set has reached a point of explosion as the present Lee Myung Bak regime which emerged a "pragmatic government" pursued pro-U.S. treachery, confrontation with fellow countrymen and unpopular misrule. The political crisis has now reached the extremes in south Korea.
					
					Lee group of traitors will have to pay dearly for its racket for confrontation with the DPRK and moves for a war of aggression which added to crimes it had already committed.

articles.title: Juche Idea Study Organization of Benin Meets
articles.content:
Juche Idea Study Organization of Benin Meets
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and of General Kim Jong Il's Works took place in Cotonou on Jan. 19. 
					At the meeting Chairman Hessou Kohovi summed up the last year's activities of the organization and announced this year's work plan.
					
					The secretary general and other speakers said that the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il are throwing bright rays all over the world. They were distinguished thinkers and theoreticians and great teachers who founded the immortal Juche idea and developed it in depth to bring the independent idea and indomitable fighting spirit home to the world progressives, the speakers added.
					
					They pledged to further deepen the study and dissemination of the Juche idea and expand the ranks of Juche idea followers ahead of the World Conference on the Juche Idea.

articles.title: DPRK's Joint New Year Editorial Reported Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Joint New Year Editorial Reported Abroad
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- The joint New Year editorial of the DPRK has been reported in different countries in the period between Jan. 6 and 13.
					Indian newspaper Defence and Humanity said: The editorial called New Year, Juche 101 (2012) the year when leader Kim Jong Il's plan for achieving prosperity will bear a brilliant fruit, the year of a grand march when a new century of President Kim Il Sung's Korea begins.
					
					The editorial stressed the need to vigorously launch an all-out drive to carry out the grand strategy of the Workers' Party of Korea for achieving prosperity, glorify the DPRK as a highly civilized, socialist country and consolidate the national defence capabilities in every way under the unfurled banner of Songun, the paper said.
					
					The Internet homepage of the Brazilian Communist Party said the DPRK set forth a goal for 2012 and put forward the reunification of the country as the greatest national task assigned to the present generation by publishing the joint New Year editorial.
					
					A newspaper of Russia, newspaper of the Czech Republic Halo Noviny and Mexican magazine Siempre carried the gist of the joint New Year editorial.

articles.title: DPRK's Cause of National Reunification Supported in Thailand
articles.content:
DPRK's Cause of National Reunification Supported in Thailand
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- The Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association supported the joint New Year editorial of the DPRK in a statement released on Jan. 11.
					The joint editorial set forth tasks for bringing about a decisive turn in accomplishing the cause of Korea's reunification, the statement said, and continued:
					
					Today the dear respected Kim Jong Un, another matchless patriot, stands in the van of the drive for carrying out the cause of Korea's reunification which advances under the banner of the three charters for national reunification and the north-south joint declarations.
					
					Last year, proceeding from a patriotic intention to open a new phase for reunification and prosperity, the DPRK proposed dialogue and negotiations to south Korea, and has made consistent efforts to realize them.
					
					However, the south Korean authorities responded by intensifying worship for the United States, stoking confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and escalating war maneuvers against the north while going against the trend of the times and the public sentiments.
					
					They turned away from the DPRK which deeply mourned the greatest loss of the nation and blocked south Koreans from expressing condolences.
					
					This year marks the fifth anniversary of the publication of the October 4 Declaration.
					
					The joint editorial noted that all the fellow countrymen in the north, south and abroad should maintain the transparent stand of preserving national independence and putting the nation's interests above all so as to make the atmosphere of positively supporting and implementing the north-south declarations pervade the whole territory.
					
					The editorial called on the entire nation to hold higher the banner of peace against war and foil every reckless military provocation, arms buildup and DPRK-targeted war exercises and heighten vigilance against the danger of military collusion of the bellicose forces at home and abroad and get the U.S. aggressor forces pulled out of south Korea. 
					
					The Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association extends full support to the joint New Year editorial of the DPRK and is convinced that the Korean people would bring about a decisive turn in accomplishing the cause of the country's reunification this year.

articles.title: DPRK's Joint New Year Editorial Supported by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
DPRK's Joint New Year Editorial Supported by Nigerian Organization
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea on Jan. 16 and 17 posted on its Internet homepage articles titled "DPRK in 2012" and "DPRK: To open the gate of reunification".
					The joint editorial for the New Year 2012 drew more worldwide attention as it was published after the untimely demise of the great leader Kim Jong Il, the homepage said, and went on:
					
					The joint editorial reflects the will of the Korean people to carry through the behests of Kim Jong Il, holding him in high esteem forever.
					
					Also reflected in the editorial is the faith of the Korean people to carry forward to completion the socialist cause under the leadership of the dear respected HE Kim Jong Un.
					
					This year the Korean people will push forward the general charge to strengthen the might of political and ideological unity which represents the foremost state power and also implement the grand strategy of the Workers' Party of Korea for achieving prosperity.
					
					The Korean people, who turned out in the New Year's grand march full of conviction of victory rallied close around HE Kim Jong Un, will register brilliant successes in this year's drive to open the gate to a thriving nation.
					
					"Let all the compatriots open the gates of national reunification full of fresh confidence!" This is one of the slogans laid down in the joint editorial. 
					
					The homepage hoped for an epochal turn in the movement for Korea's reunification this year.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Syrian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Syrian Paper
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- The Syrian paper Al Baath on Jan. 15 carried an article praising the undying feats of leader Kim Jong Il.
					HE Kim Jong Il was born at the secret camp on Mt. Paektu on Feb.  16, 1942, the paper said, and went on:
					
					HE Kim Jong Il comprehensively realized the Songun politics on a new high stage as required by the changing international situation in the late last century.
					
					Under his leadership the Korean people realigned the territories of the whole country as befitting those of socialism and built gravity-fed waterways, thereby performing miracles and innovations in all fields despite the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK, ceaseless natural disasters and all other challenges.
					
					The DPRK successfully made the first underground nuclear test in October 2006 and launched the second satellite in April 2009.
					
					HE Kim Jong Il, great leader of the Korean people passed away on Dec. 17, 2011 on a train while providing energetic field guidance.
					
					The Korean people are working hard to implement the behests of HE Kim Jong Il, holding the dear respected HE Kim Jong Un as the supreme leader.

articles.title: Formation of Anti-U.S. Joint Front is General Trend
articles.content:
Formation of Anti-U.S. Joint Front is General Trend
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- The movement to form an anti-U.S. joint front is active in the international arena this year in an effort to cope with the U.S. moves to dominate the world. This trend is drawing the world attention.
					A typical example is Iranian President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad's five-day visits to four Latin American countries from Jan. 8
					
					The U.S. employed every possible means and ways to bar his visits by putting pressure on those countries that agreed to host the Iranian president.
					
					Governments of Iran and Latin American countries resolutely rejected the pressure and warnings of the U.S. and put their plans into practice, demonstrating their will to fight it out against the U.S.
					
					Welcoming the Iranian president's visits to their countries, the Latin American countries clarified their stand to conduct dynamic joint struggle against the U.S. by rejecting the U.S. brigandish demand and boosting solidarity and cooperation with Iran.
					
					When the U.S. threatened to slap sanctions against Iran over its oil export while taking issue with its nuclear development for peaceful purposes, the Iranian government strongly reacted to it, threatening that it would close the Strait of Hormuz.
					
					Upset by this, the U.S. is crying out for military option in case of the closure.
					
					The world is of the view that the recent visits provided a good opportunity for Iran and the Latin American countries to reaffirm their common stand against the U.S. and pool their efforts to foil the U.S. moves to isolate and control them.
					
					The formation of the anti-U.S. joint front is the general world trend at present.

articles.title: Unemployment Serious in U.S.
articles.content:
Unemployment Serious in U.S.
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- An unemployment issue is getting serious in the U.S. due to the financial economic crisis.
					The Labor Department said on Jan. 19 that the advance figure for seasonally adjusted initial claims for jobless benefits was 352 000 in the week ending Jan. 14.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita la Escuela Revolucionaria de Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita la Escuela Revolucionaria de Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, 25 de enero (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Estado y el ejercito, visito la Escuela Revolucionaria de Mangyongdae y felicito a los profesores, empleados y alumnos con motivo del Ano Nuevo Lunar.
					Luego de recibir el parte de recepcion, Kim Jong Un dijo que vino a la escuela para ver como los alumnos celebran el Ano Nuevo Lunar, mientras estrechaba la mano con los funcionarios directivos de la escuela y se dirigio a la tarima de filmacion para fotografiarse con ellos y alumnos.
					
					Se acerco a los alumnos llorando de emocion y apreto sus manos preguntandoles carinosamente por que no llevaban los guantes si bien hacia mucho frio.
					
					Luego, dio una vuelta por la estatua de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung, erguida en la escuela.
					
					Senalo que el Presidente y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il prestaron siempre profunda atencion a la formacion de los alumnos de aqui como pilares de la revolucion.
					
					Subrayo que los alumnos de esta escuela son los tesoros de la revolucion que apoyaran al frente en toda su vida la direccion del partido sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, y destaco que se debe formarlos como los fuertes en la fe que compartan siempre el mismo destino con el partido, al igual que sus padres.
					
					El Comandante Supremo recorrio las salas de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y de presentacion del historial.
					
					Ante el uniforme de los alumnos, dijo que la raya roja en las mangas tiene mucho significado y enseno encarecidamente que los alumnos no deben olvidar el noble deseo de los Grandes Hombres del monte Paektu reflejado en ella.
					
					Recorriendo varias salas de leccion y los laboratorios, que llegaron a tener modernas condiciones docentes y magnificos equipos de ciencia y educacion gracias a las medidas benevolas del partido, se entero detalladamente del estado de educacion de la escuela.
					
					Pasando revista al dormitorio, el comedor, las salas de los comites de la Union de Ninos de Corea y de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung en la escuela, se cercioro de los detalles de la vida de los alumnos.
					
					Dio enfasis en que la escuela imparta bien la educacion, de modo que todos los alumnos dieran firme continuidad a la revolucion sin olvidar sus origenes.
					
					Prometio enviar buena variedad de cesped para plantarlo en el campo deportivo de la escuela mientras caminaba en la via interior obscurecida.
					
					E instruyo instalar los tatamis de goma en las canchas de baloncesto y voleibol al aire libre.
					
					Proponiendo recorrer todas las instalaciones aunque pase mucho tiempo, entro en el gimnasio donde asigno la tarea de mantener lisa la cancha para que los alumnos no sufran heridas en las rodillas durante sus actividades deportivas.
					
					Prometio mandar a la escuela a los disenadores para acondicionar mejor el gimnasio.
					
					Viendo en la biblioteca electronica a los alumnos manejando las computadoras, tomo medidas necesarias para facilitar el acceso a la red de computacion. 
					
					Sentado a una silla de la Casa de Alumnos, dijo que este establecimiento ha sido acondicionado bien y averiguo en detalles las condiciones de efectos acusticos.
					
					Me siento en esta escuela como en mi casa natal y aqui se me redobla la decision de llevar a feliz termino la revolucion, apunto.
					
					Presento las tareas importantes que serviran de directiva en la educacion y la administracion de la escuela que tiene la noble mision de formar los pilares a cargo de continuar firmemente el linaje de la revolucion coreana.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, los generales de ejercito del EPC, Pak Jae Gyong y Hyon Chol Hae, el primer subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Ri Jae Il, y el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Hwang Pyong So.

articles.title: Premier coreano analiza labores de  campos de construccion en Pyongyang
articles.content:
Premier coreano analiza labores de  campos de construccion en Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 25 de enero (ACNC) -- El primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Choe Yong Rim, analizo el dia 24 en el terreno las labores del campo de construccion del Parque Folclorico de Pyongyang y el de obra de ampliacion del invernadero del Instituto de Ciencia de Verduras de Pyongyang, donde se desarrollan dinamicas campanas para terminar con antelacion las obras, en acato al proposito del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un de asegurar al pueblo coreano las condiciones de vida mas rica y culta. 
					El premier recorrio varios lugares de los campos de construccion donde se crean diariamente las innovaciones siguiendo el fervor de Hamnam (provincia de Hamgyong del Sur) para materializar cabalmente las tareas indicadas en la resolucion del Buro Politico del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, las consignas conjuntas del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central, del PTC, y el editorial conjunto publicado con motivo del Ano Nuevo, y averiguo los detalles de la marcha de las obras. 
					
					Convoco en el terreno la reunion consultiva de los funcionarios concernientes. 
					
					En la ocasion se dio enfasis en la necesidad de terminar con antelacion las obras en acato al legado del Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Y se abordaron el tema de introducir los metodos racionales y cientificos de construccion para cumplir con antelacion las obras de objetos importantes, el de suministrar con prioridad los materiales necesarios a la construccion para impulsarlas ininterrumpidamente aun en las condiciones invernales, etc.
					
					El foro busco las medidas practicas para que los miembros de mando, como dignos funcionarios de la era de gran auge, hagan con escrupulosidad la organizacion y la direccion de la produccion en el mismo terreno, y que los dominios y unidades concernientes suministren suficientemente los materiales planificados por procesos, de acuerdo con la marcha de las obras en etapa final.

articles.title: Revelado crimen narcotico de trapas norteamericanas en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Revelado crimen narcotico de trapas norteamericanas en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 25 de enero (ACNC) -- Hace poco, quedo revelado un hecho de que un uniformado de las tropas norteamericanas introdujo al Sur de Corea la  enorme cantidad de droga.
					Lo hizo en secreto mediante el correo internacional el gringo, que pasa su servicio militar en una unidad de las fuerzas terrestres norteamericanas, enclavada en la ciudad de Songnam de la provincia de Kyonggi.
					
					En su habitacion fue descubierta la sustancia similar a la droga.
					
					Esto demuestra fehacientemente que tal crimen narcotico cada vez mas extendido se debe enteramente a las tropas agresoras yanquis.
					
					El numero de los casos descubiertos desde enero hasta agosto de 1999 llega a mas de 10.
					
					Con  posterioridad, fue revelado que un oficial de la septima fuerza aerea norteamericana introdujo una gran cantidad de cocaina y las familias de las tropas agresoras se entusiasmaron en el narcotrafico.
					
					Las drogas introducidas perjudican grandemente a los habitantes surcoreanos.
					
					En la decada de 1960, innumerables mujeres surcoreanas intoxicadas por las drogas, quedaron desaparecidas o muertas por la enfermedad.
					
					Para colmo, las tropas yanquis las utilizaron para realizar la ambicion de asesinar, lo que resulto el mas gran delincuente social.
					
					En marzo de 1970, un uniformado yanqui intoxicado degollo en Tongduchon de la provincia de Kyonggi los esposos de Kim Hwa Nam y en diciembre de 1987, mato en Taegu a una mujer con tijeras.
					
					En fin de cuentas, las tropas agresoras norteamericanas son la fuente de todas las desgracias y penas que sufren los habitantes surcoreanos.
